document_data.caption: A map showing Hlethvagi's Coins outlined in black.
document_data.name: Hlethvagi's Coins
document_data.mainbody: '''Hlethvagi's Coins''' was a moneychanging house located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: Hlethvagi's Coins was located in the far southern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] near the [[South Gate (Waterdeep)|South Gate]] where the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] and [[Waymoot (Waterdeep)|Waymoot]] joined. The rear of the building sat on [[Carter's Way]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Adventurers' Quarter}}
document_data.Inhabitants: The business was owned by [[Hlethvagi Anteos]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
